<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Animated Dragonstorms](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1586)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 10</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +7

**Con** +9

**Int** -5

**Wis** +5

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +33 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +27 

</row>

**HP** 255

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 15, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 15, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 15, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15, physical 15

**Weaknesses**
good 20

**Vulnerable to Dispelling** The animated dragonstorm can be targeted by [_disjunction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=77) and [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78). If targeted by such a spell of 9th level or higher, the construct loses its resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and physical damage and is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +35 ([deadly 3d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 5d10+12 bludgeoning plus dragonstorm strike

**Channel Dragonstorm** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) The animated dragonstorm directs a 30-foot cone of dragonstorm energy. This deals 3d8 acid, 3d8 cold, 3d8 electricity, 3d8 fire, and 3d8 poison damage to creatures in the cone (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The animated dragonstorm can't use Channel Dragonstorm again for 1d4 rounds.

**Destructive Strikes**   The animated dragonstorm's attacks ignore the Hardness of objects with Hardness 20 or less.

**Dragonstorm Strike**   On a critical hit, the animated dragonstorm's fist bursts with dragonstorm energy. The target takes 1d6 acid, 1d6 cold, 1d6 electricity, 1d6 fire, and 1d6 poison damage.

</column>
name: Animated Dragonstorms
